name: Resurfacing Detox Serum  1oz
description: This multi-corrective complex serum contains potent natural herbs that detoxify and brighten uneven skin. No matter how stressed or damaged the skin is, this serum helps resurface and renew it. Gentle on all types of skin. Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Limonia Acidissima (Thanaka) Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Glycolic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ubiquinone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Panthenyl PEG-7 Dimethicone Phosphate Chloride, Phytic Acid, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Cymbopogon Citratus Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Acetic Acid, Lecithin, Lactic Acid, Squalane, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Fragrance, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol
